segments.text: did you watch the Oscars on Sunday night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , but I heard about that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt didn't attend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , that was surprising . I heard that they got into a fight and then decided not to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: they must be the most famous celebrity couple in Hollywood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: they're also one of the richest couples . They have so many money and they can buy almost anything they want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also heard that Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes made an appearance at the Oscars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: did either one of them win an Oscar this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think Tom might have been nominated for one of his films , but I don't think he won anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tom Cruise may be handsome , but I think he's a bit crazy , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , his marriage to Katie is actually quite scandalous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I still think that they only got married to get more publicity for their movies and themselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: people in show biz can have such an easy life ; I don't know why they have to make it so complicated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would never want to be a celebrity because the paparazzi would also be after you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's true . I guess it would be difficult to have people taking pictures of you everywhere you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thank goodness we're not rich and famous !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: being famous , I can do without , but I wouldn't mind being rich .
segments.speaker: S2
